name: A Business Power
description:
Want to Become a Businessman? Well it's your chance to become One.

In this New Game by S.A. DigiWorks, You can become a Businessman and make a Company that makes Products. There are a lot of Products that are ready for you to be Produced. You Can research more Products to Expand your Production Line and research Factories to make more Products at Once. Compete with Other Companies and Race to the Top Spot in the Competition. Can you become the Number One Company in the Competition?
